script:
"Starting a new project feels like brewing the perfect coffee. ☕️  
You measure the scope, grind out the details...  
But halfway through, realize you forgot the coffee filter—your comments! 😬  
Result? A bitter cup of 'What the heck did I write?' 🤦‍♂️  
Smash like for coder life hacks! 🎮"
preview: A humorous take on programmers' coffee addiction
